entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 11 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
